selected_for_growth.decision_rationale: Promotion to permanent feature. Observability is non-negotiable for a high-frequency audio engine.

risks_and_mitigations.risk: Loss of ability to disable telemetry
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Ensure it's lightweight and doesn't impact performance

selected_for_growth.estimated_roi: Reduced technical debt and guaranteed data quality

selected_for_growth.decision_rationale: Move from BETA to STABLE and enable by default. High user value demonstrated.

risks_and_mitigations.risk: Difficulty might be too aggressive for some
risks_and_mitigations.mitigation: Allow users to override in settings later

hold_for_growth.reason: Needs more benchmarking on different devices before general rollout.
hold_for_growth.unblock_condition: Successful completion of the performance test suite

executive_summary.estimated_impact: Significantly improved core practice engine stability and personalization.
key_risks: Minor performance impact from permanent telemetry
